scripts.run: cd statki-online-frontend && npm run start-the-machine && cd .. && cd statkiOnlineBackend && python3 manage.py runserver
scripts.install-and-run: cd statki-online-frontend && npm install && npm run start-the-machine && cd .. && cd statkiOnlineBackend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && python3 manage.py runserver
